articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag has the backing of senior Old Trafford figures to deliver the sustained success the club craves, despite Sunday's home defeat to rivals Liverpool.
articles.title: Manchester United: Erik ten Hag has club backing despite Liverpool loss

articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper - Vogue model, Oasis fan and now Grand Slam quarter-finalist - shows the future is bright in the first major since Andy Murray's retirement.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Jack Draper running with baton passed by Andy Murray in New York

articles.description: Great Britain won six gold medals on day five as ParalympicsGB continued their bountiful Games at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paralympics 2024: GB win Paralympic triathlon, boccia, swimming golds - round-up

articles.description: A world champion cyclist has swapped the velodrome for the cramped deck of the fastest yacht in the world. Why?
articles.title: America's Cup: Saddling up on the high seas - the life of a cyclor

articles.description: Portugal legend Cristiano Ronaldo says he has no plans to retire from international football yet - but it "won't be a difficult decision to make".
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo on Portugal future: 'When the time comes, I'll move on'

articles.description: Casemiro's wife defends her husband following criticism after Sunday's 3-0 defeat by Liverpool, reminding people of the many trophies he has won.
articles.title: Manchester United: Casemiro's wife hits back after criticism

articles.description: Galatasaray confirm they are in talks with Napoli to sign Nigeria striker Victor Osimhen on loan.
articles.title: Victor Osimhen: Galatasaray in talks to sign Napoli and Nigeria striker

articles.description: Daniil Medvedev drops just four games as he breezes past Nuno Borges to secure his place in the US Open quarter-finals.
articles.title: US Open 2024 results: Daniil Medvedev thrashes Nuno Borges to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: Pregnant Para-archer Jodie Grinham and Nathan MacQueen win gold for Great Britain in the mixed team compound final.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Pregnant Jodie Grinham and Nathan MacQueen win gold for GB

articles.description: Great Britain win two swimming gold medals in 15 scintillating minutes in the pool at Paris 2024 on Monday.
articles.title: Paralympics 2024: Great Britain's Ellie Challis and Louise Fiddes win golds in Paris
